document_data.name: Summon Undead IV
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon undead IV''''', also known as '''''undead summoning IV''''', was one of the series of ''[[summon undead]]'' spells available to arcane casters in the [[Forgotten Realms|Realms]].
document_data.Effects:
This spell could summon an [[allip]], a [[ghast]], or a huge [[zombie]], which was usually the remains of a [[wyvern]]. As an alternative, the spell could summon one to three [[ghouls]], one to three huge [[skeleton]]s, one to three large zombies, two to five large or medium-sized skeletons, or two to five medium-sized or small zombies—provided they were all within 30 feet of each other. 

If a ghast or ghoul were summoned, the spell was considered a [[:Category:Chaotic spells|chaotic spell]] in addition to an [[:Category:Evil spells|evil]] one.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a [[material component]], a piece of bone from either a [[lich]], [[mummy]] or [[vampire]].
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
